item.title: Android Studio 3.0 Canary 1
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rHiA66zUv8c&list=PLWz5rJ2EKKc_w6fodMGrA1_tsI3pqPbqa This video shows many of the important and useful features common in IDEs or Integrated Development Environment. IntelliJ IDE provides the core features of the Android Studio distribution.
